description: Try our easy to follow Crumbed Fish Bites recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crumbed Fish Bites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs flat-leaf parsley, chopped (& extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Process fish in a food processor until a paste forms. Transfer to a bowl and combine with potato, onion, parsley, mustard and egg yolk. Season to taste.
Shape tablespoonfuls of fish mixture into balls. Coat each fish ball in flour, egg and breadcrumbs. Place on a plate.
Heat oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Gently drop balls into oil, in batches, and cook for 1-2 minutes or until golden. Serve with mayonnaise and garnish with parsley.
